Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ads

Interface IServerDAIPackage

  • public interface IServerDAIPackage
    The ServerDAIPackage represents the sequence of adverts encapsulated within an asset using Dynamic Ad Injection by the server. The ads are automatically played as part of the stream, this interface provides some details that may be required to manage playback and report impressions. IServerDAIPackage provides details on the media duration and ad insertion cue points that may be required to provide playback progress indicators or control seeking over the adverts. It also provides a method to report media verification ids for impression tracking to the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long getContentDuration()
      The total duration of the content, without adverts, in milliseconds.
      long getContentTimeForStreamTime​(long time)
      Returns the content time without ads for a given stream time.
      List<IServerDAICuePoint> getCuePoints()
      Get the cue points for adverts in the stream.
      IServerDAICuePoint getPreviousCuePointForStreamTime​(long time)
      Returns the previous cuepoint for the given stream time.
      long getStreamTimeForContentTime​(long time)
      Returns the stream time with ads for a given content time.
      long getTotalDuration()
      The total duration of the media, including adverts, in milliseconds.
      void sendMediaVerificationId​(String mediaVerificationId, long currentPlaybackPosition)
      Make a call to the server to send a media verification id, or if no network is available then store and send at the earliest opportunity.
      void setMediaPlaybackPosition​(long currentPlaybackPosition)
      Set the current playback position in the asset.
      void useAutomaticCueMarks​(boolean automatic)
      Set if cue marks should automatically be marked as played

    • Method Detail

      • getContentDuration

        long getContentDuration()
        The total duration of the content, without adverts, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Duration in milliseconds.

      • getTotalDuration

        long getTotalDuration()
        The total duration of the media, including adverts, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Duration in milliseconds.

      • getCuePoints

        List<IServerDAICuePoint> getCuePoints()
        Get the cue points for adverts in the stream. Each cue point represents an ad break in the media and contains the start and end times, plus duration, in seconds for that break.
        Returns:
        The list of IServerDAICuePoint ad breaks, or an empty array if none are defined.

      • sendMediaVerificationId

        void sendMediaVerificationId​(String mediaVerificationId,
                             long currentPlaybackPosition)
        Make a call to the server to send a media verification id, or if no network is available then store and send at the earliest opportunity. For Google DAI the id is appended to the url.
        Parameters:
        mediaVerificationId - The media verification id.
        currentPlaybackPosition - The current playback position in milliseconds

      • setMediaPlaybackPosition

        void setMediaPlaybackPosition​(long currentPlaybackPosition)
        Set the current playback position in the asset.
        Parameters:
        currentPlaybackPosition - The current playback time in ms

      • useAutomaticCueMarks

        void useAutomaticCueMarks​(boolean automatic)
        Set if cue marks should automatically be marked as played
        Parameters:
        automatic - true if cue marks should be automatically set played

      • getStreamTimeForContentTime

        long getStreamTimeForContentTime​(long time)
        Returns the stream time with ads for a given content time.
        Parameters:
        time - the content time to check
        Returns:
        the stream time that corresponds with the given content time once ads are inserted.

      • getContentTimeForStreamTime

        long getContentTimeForStreamTime​(long time)
        Returns the content time without ads for a given stream time.
        Parameters:
        time - the stream time to check
        Returns:
        the content time that corresponds with the given stream time once ads are removed.

      • getPreviousCuePointForStreamTime

        IServerDAICuePoint getPreviousCuePointForStreamTime​(long time)
        Returns the previous cuepoint for the given stream time. Returns null if no such cuepoint exists. This is used to implement features like snap back, and called when the publisher detects that the user seeked in order to return the user to an ad break.
        Parameters:
        time - the stream time to check
        Returns:
        the previous cuepoint for the given stream time or null if none exists
